name: PowerK
description:
This game is made for game jam with theme "Superpower"

Sorry to say but I made this game in just last 14 hours..

So, my game doesn't contain some features...

User guide

A,D or left / right arrow to move left and right

W / up arrow for jump and double jump

G to use life sucker power

"0" to choose fire power

1 -to choose water power

2 -to use electric power

3 -to use default - rays power
